entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't work with native AOT `IlcDisableReflection` #68093
  • NativeAOT publish regression in preview version (worked with alpha) hangs and uses 20GB+ memory #68079
  • System.Text.Json source generator crashes when processing unresolved symbols #68072
    7.0.0
  • MutualTLS authentication in C# for httpclient #68070
  • enterprise-linux pipeline should report results to test database #68067

Closed

  • Random exceptions when calling System.Type.GetInterface #67144
  • Bogus null checks in MeterListener.SetMeasurementEventCallback<T> #68025
    7.0.0
  • [7.0.100-preview.4.22212.1] File.AppendAllTextAsync/WriteAllTextAsync doesn't throw System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #68073
    7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.sh #67603
    6.0.x
  • S.P.C PDB is being overwritten by NativeAOT PDB in folder #67851
    7.0.0
  • TLS1.3 networking tests are flaky on Windows 11 #58927
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\largefuncletframe\\largefuncletframe.cmd #68003
    7.0.0
  • [Proposal] Analyzer that suggests ToUpperInvariant/ToLowerInvariant in place of ToUpper/ToLower #43976
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.***.Abstractions nuget package/metapackage for use in class library #67637
  • dotnet/optimization builds are broken #66646
  • [API Proposal]: Add ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly() #66126
    7.0.0
  • Generating `ref` files automatically after making changes in source files #68057
  • Error in load assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=4.0.4.1' #68023
  • WasmTestRunner failing with assertion for generic math tests #67999
    7.0.0
  • Custom apphost fails to flush nettrace file on shutdown #67877
    7.0.0
  • Run a .NET framework dll from .NET Core #68041

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cmake RPATH CMP0068 warnings #68095
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Expose APIs for getting the exponent and significand for IFloatingPoint types #68094
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Move test that uses the network to outerloop #68092
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support d8 instead of dx in ApkBuilder #68084
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: fix flags lossage in morph comma/ind interchange #68082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Validate public APIs have an implementation #68080
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Correct MSVC version in requirements documentation #68078
    community-contribution
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Retype pointers to 'this' on stack as unmanaged pointers #68074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable failures related to 'refPosition->RegOptional()' #68068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix Assembly reference in unloadability #67922
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • NativeAOT build support and doc improvements #68038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support nullability in SetMeasurementEventCallback (fixes #68025) #68071
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Copy AOT PDBs to a subdirectory #68063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • disable Tls 1.0 and 1.1 tests on new Windows #68083
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Use no-recent-activity in inactive Draft PRs #66771
    area-Meta
  • Fix documentation issues in recent DateTime API additions #68019
    area-System.Runtime
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • re-enable TLS 13 tests on Windows #68009
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • JIT: fix assert seen in some OSR cases #68048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SPCL to glossary. #68081
    documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix JITDUMP alignment of promoted fields #68076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix MissingMethodException on calling methods with pointer arrays on generic classes #68059
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve JsonTestHelpers.AssertJsonEqual error messages #67973
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Expose the GetShortestBitLength, GetByteCount, and WriteLittleEndian APIs #67939
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly() #68051
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono] Cleanup assembly loading #67984
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move Regex pattern description into partial method remarks #67990
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Reduce r2r-extra GC stress level to 0xC per #68060 #68062
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Handle static virtual methods correctly during IMT table const… #68058
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix tests broken on 'main' #68054
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding generic-math tests for decimal and double/single/half to parity the integer tests #68043
    area-System.Runtime
  • disable NTLM tests on systems with OpenSSL 3 #68039
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Fix PGO trace data collection in the presence of collectible assemblies #68001
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, PGO
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta

Updated

  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix pointer array marshalling #67988
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • vm: Improve getStringLiteral for dynamic context #68055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    area-Infrastructure, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, no-recent-activity, 7.0.0
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Add Arm64 PGO Builds #66867
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity
  • Use and support OpenSSL 3 on macOS #68045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable exception for uint type. #68022
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #68050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
